author: William Vaillancourt
title: Republicans Who Voted to Impeach Trump Are Fundraising Laps Around Their MAGA Primary Opponents

sentence: Against Rep. Jaime Herrera Beutler, he's backed Army veteran Joe Kent.
title: Defiant GOP impeachment voters gear up for Trump-backed primaries

sentence: These chyrons appeared during Carlson's show, accompanying Carlson's statements prior to and during his colloquy with his guest, Joe Kenta Donald Trump-endorsed zealot currently attempting to unseat Washington Rep. Jaime Herrera Butler.
title: America now has its own 'Fifth Column,' and its name is Fox News
